metadata.description: Public marketplace for Claude Code plugins and MCP clients from CE Dot Net

plugins.name: ace
plugins.description: Code Engine ACE - Intelligent pattern learning with CLI Architecture. v5.1.6: Claude Code v2.0 integration - auto-approves safe ACE commands (search, status, patterns), enhanced trajectory tracking with tool_use_id support. Requires ce-ace >= v1.0.11.
